news_header: Dr. Mustafa Ali Abdulrahman Ibo and his team perform surgeries in a besieged hospital in el-Fasher, Sudan, facing constant bombardment and high casualties.
news_text: Dr. Mustafa Ali Abdulrahman Ibo and his colleagues are conducting surgeries in the last operational hospital in el-Fasher, Sudan, amidst relentless shelling. The hospital has reported 28 deaths and over 50 injuries in the past month due to escalating attacks. Despite the dire conditions, including power outages and a lack of medical supplies, the medical team continues to save lives. The ongoing civil war in Sudan has led to a humanitarian crisis, with the RSF accused of ethnic cleansing. The situation is critical, with the hospital being the only facility capable of performing surgeries in North Darfur.
